title: Drawing, "Design for Furniture and Details", 1980s
medium: Red crayon, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed, upside down, in graphite on verso:  Frandisco Usesche 718-389-1855/Brooklyn/(Greenpoint [with graphite doodle]
description: At left, a tall structure in robot form.  The vertical central element has right arm in form of an extension mirror.  Lower half of structure rests on a tall scaffold, a cone form and a pod-like leg.  To right is outline drawing of scaffold and above this a sketch of a three-part form on wire legs.
